Context: The Black Student Support Network (BSSN) at George Brown College offers tutoring and mentoring services, and coordinates special events in partnership with Student Life and Academic and Student Affairs. The contacts for the BSSN team are: Abisola Asha (BSSN Coordinator & Black Student Support Specialist), Deliah Jackson (BSSN Academic/Career Advisor), Joe Stapleton (Manager of Student Services and Campus Life), and the BSSN team in general. Their emails are provided in the text. For more information about the BSSN tutor, send an email to bssn@georgebrown.ca. Interested individuals can sign up to receive updates about application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more by visiting the college's website and signing up. The contacts for general inquiries are 416-415-2000 and TTY: 1-877-515-5559, with emails at ask.george@georgebrown.ca. It is noted that the information contained in the website may be subject to change without notice.
